name: FIFA 2004
description: FIFA Soccer 2004 is the most complete and authentic soccer experience for true soccer fans. This year's action is deeper than ever with advanced levels of player detail and responsiveness. Plus, a new Career Mode gives you the chance to take a team from the lower divisions, battle through ranks, sign new players, and turn them into champions. With immersive atmospheres, total realism with the world’s premier clubs, and industry-leading gameplay, FIFA Soccer 2004 returns as the true authority in soccer gaming.
